IntersectionObserverEntryIntersectionRec.summary:
The interface's
read-only intersectionRect property is a
object which describes the smallest rectangle that
contains the entire portion of the target element which is currently visible within
the intersection root.
IntersectionObserverEntryIntersectionRec.value:
A which describes the part of the target element that's
currently visible within the root's intersection rectangle.This rectangle is computed by taking the intersection of
with each of the
's ancestors' clip rectangles,
with the exception of the intersection
itself.
